description: EPDM SCBA Face Seal is the portion of an SCBA facepiece made from EPDM rubber that seals the mask against the face of a firefighter.
short desc: EPDM SCBA Face Seal is the portion of an SCBA facepiece that seals the mask against the face.
source: Sampled from a structural firefighter helmet.

measured property.test description: Initial-mass-normalized mass loss rate [1/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.
